name: heat-wave
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.
